title: Everyday Japanese Situational Phrases Quiz
description: Master practical Japanese expressions for various daily situations with this quiz.

items.question: How do you say 'Excuse me' when passing through a crowded place?
items.hint: Apology or seeking attention in a crowded place

items.question: What is the Japanese word for 'Good afternoon'?
How do you say 'I'm fine' when someone asks how you are?
items.hint: Responding positively to a well-being inquiry

items.question: What is the Japanese word for 'Small'?
How do you ask 'What is your age?' in Japanese?
What is the Japanese word for 'Tired'?
How do you say 'Please wait a moment' in Japanese?
items.hint: Requesting someone to wait for a short time

items.question: What is the Japanese word for 'Rainy'?
How do you say 'I don't like it' in Japanese?
What is the Japanese word for 'Beautiful' (scenery)?
